trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Taylor
There were no other sightings in Taylor on or around August 14th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswas in back yard watching stars and planes in sky when i looked to the northern sky saw a red glowing object that did not look anything like a plane it moved in a straight line from north to south in a southeast direction slightly then after about 2 minutes it shot up towards the stars till it vanished from sight.it was about 11:45 pm est. I did not have my camera or my phone with me so i have no proof just thought i would share in case someone else saw it and reported it.
Summary: red ball came out of north got to almost directly east the went up and out of sight
